mapper.select:
select count(*) count from t_hiddanger_declare hd left join user u on u.id = hd.unit_id left join item im1 on im1.id=hd.status_id left join item im2 on im2.id=hd.reviewstatus_id left join t_sys_unit unit on unit.id = hd.unit_id
${key} #{item}
select * from t_hiddanger_declare order by createtime desc limit 1;
